txt.en:
Ost Elendil, the great palace of the kings of old, is on the island beyond the bridge of Ariant. At its base is the entrance to Haudh Valandil, the tomb of Valandil son of Isildur. I fear that the tomb, long-undisturbed, has become the home to great evils: both of Angmar's design and otherwise.

Have you seen the vile creatures known as Kergrim? They are believed to be some relative of the cave-claw, but more prone to disease and the desecration of hallowed places.

Some of these beasts have come to Haudh Valandil, and they must be cleared from the tomb, especially their brute of a leader: Shingrinder, he is called, and he is vile. You will do this, [placeholder], if you honour the ancient places of the Dúnedain, and you will return to me with news of your success. If I have been drawn elsewhere, report instead to Captain-General Daerdan at Echad Garthadir, the Ranger-encampment here in the city.

'Ost Elendil, the great palace of the kings of old, is on the island beyond the bridge of Ariant. At its base is the entrance to Haudh Valandil, the tomb of Valandil son of Isildur. I fear that the tomb, long-undisturbed, has become the home to great evils: both of Angmar's design and otherwise.

'Have you seen the vile creatures known as Kergrim? They are believed to be some relative of the cave-claw, but more prone to disease and the desecration of hallowed places.

'Some of these beasts have come to Haudh Valandil, and they must be cleared from the tomb, especially their brute of a leader: Shingrinder, he is called, and he is vile. You will do this, [placeholder], if you honour the ancient places of the Dúnedain, and you will return to me with news of your success. If I have been drawn elsewhere, report instead to Captain-General Daerdan at Echad Garthadir, the Ranger-encampment here in the city.'

Kergrim stalk Haudh Valandil, the tomb on the island beyond the bridge of Ariant, in Annúminas.\n\nGlangilith has asked you to defeat the kergrim that stalk the depths of Haudh Valandil, including their leader Shingrinder.
'Fewer kergrim now stalk the hallowed halls of Haudh Valandil? I am delighted to hear it, [placeholder]! I will reward you for this victory.'

Glangilith is probably in Tirband, the court beneath the great watch-tower on the highest level of the city. If he is not, he asked you to report instead to Captain-General Daerdan at the Ranger-encampment of Echad Garthadir at the heart of Annúminas.\n\nYou have defeated the Kergrim that stalked Haudh Valandil and should report news of your victory to Glangilith.
'The Kergrim are vile, filthy creatures and do not belong in the tombs of the kings.'
'Fewer Kergrim now stalk the depths of Haudh Valandil? I am pleased to hear of it, [placeholder]. You are a true friend of the Dúnedain!'
'Haudh Valandil must be kept free of evil.'
'Haudh Valandil must be kept free of evil.'
